meanings.sent1: The goxes ran across the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of goxes playing in the park.
meanings.sent3: The goxes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The goxes moved in unison, like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The colorful goxes stood out against the green grass.

meanings.definition: goxes (verb): third person singular present of gox
meanings.sent1: He goxes to the store every morning.
meanings.sent2: She goxes to school on her bike.
meanings.sent3: The cat goxes lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Time goxes by slowly when you're waiting for something.
meanings.sent5: The river goxes steadily towards the sea.
